name: Hersheyguide
0:
”Alexa open hershey guide”
”recommend an attraction within 2 miles”
”go outside”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hershey guide
des:
Discover Hershey Pennsylvania and all it has to offer with recommendations for restaurants and attractions.
- Mention which meal you are looking to eat (breakfast/lunch/dinner/coffee) and we will help you out.
- If you are staying in the heart of Hershey simply ask 'recommend an attraction within 2 miles.'
- You can also ask to 'go outside' and we will recommend an appropriate attraction, based on the current weather in Hershey.

Note: This skill is not affiliated with Hershey, the attractions, or restaurants.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
